name: Come from Away
description: 7,000 passengers are stranded after the 9/11 terrorist attacks in a small town in Newfoundland, where they were housed and welcomed. Filmed live on stage at the Gerald Schoenfeld Theater in New York City.

review.author: patriciaannemanabat
review.heading: Solid Ensemble!
review.reviewBody: This musical is a very heartwarming musical. No seconds were wasted while watching this. Even with the limited screentime of all the characters, their arc were well written.

keywords: based on broadway musical,september 11 2001,gander newfoundland and labrador,based on true story,stage musical
